title: ESPN Signs Joe Buck, Troy Aikman to Host ‘Monday Night Football’
sub_head: Move comes as TV networks and streaming services are competing to hire big-name NFL broadcasting talent
body:
National Football League stars such as Russell Wilson and Khalil Mack aren’t the only ones switching teams this spring.
Television networks and streaming services are competing to sign up big-name broadcasting talent in an attempt to increase viewership and help recoup the significant investments they have made to acquire NFL rights.
